ROW.NAME: 大额医疗支出补助人员名单

ROW.DATDSC: select rownum xh,lsh,dwmc dwmc,pf_get_xm(2,zy) xm,hm,zh,khh,sssh,ssds, nvl(je, 0) je from cw_rjzb where instrb(zy, '大额医疗补助报销款') > 0 and ( ORG = '[%SYS_ORGID]' ) and ( ACC = '[%SYS_ACCID]' ) and ( (trim(to_char(YY,'0000'))||'-'||trim(to_char(MM,'00'))||'-'||trim(to_char(DD,'00'))) >= '[%DAT1]' ) and ( (trim(to_char(YY,'0000'))||'-'||trim(to_char(MM,'00'))||'-'||trim(to_char(DD,'00')))<= '[%DAT2]' ) and ( KMBH like '[%KMBH][%JQPP]' ) order by sxh,lsh
